label: TextTranslationSkill
description: A skill to translate text from one language to another.

fields.label: Default From Language Code
fields.tooltip: The language code to translate documents from for documents that don't specify the from language explicitly.

fields.label: Default To Language Code
fields.tooltip: The language code to translate documents into for documents that don't specify the to language explicitly.

fields.label: Suggested From
fields.tooltip: The language code to translate documents from when neither the fromLanguageCode input nor the defaultFromLanguageCode parameter are provided, and the automatic language detection is unsuccessful. Default is en.
